content:
Jasmin family

1 Jakob JASMIN
 + Bluma                             (Zanwel)
  2x Jakob JASMIN                    1799-1800 - Sep 28, 1866 #275 Tarnow
    + Reisel KRONGOLD                1803 - 1831 #154
          married Jul 25, 1820 #23
     3x Ezechiel Haskel JASMIN       1821 #377 - 1822 #23
     3o Reyla Sprinca JASMIN         1823 #255
       * Abraham Aron MOSKOWITZ      1820
             banns 1841 #67
     3o Chinda Lai JASMIN            1825 #309
     3? child JASMIN                 - 1828 #26
     3x Jonas Ber JASMIN             1829 #208
     3x Berel JASMIN                 - 1832 #56
     3x son JASMIN                   1831 #151
    + Sara Scheindel RABER           1807 - Jun 13, 1866 #169 Tarnow
          married 1831 #47
     3o Laia JASMIN                  1833 #4
       * Naftali LEIBEL              1832-33
             married Oct 30, 1851 #14 Tarnow
     3o daughter JASMIN              1833 #490 - 1833 #304
     3x Izrael JASMIN                1835 #119 - 1836 #304
     3x Izaak JASMIN                 1836 #265 - 1837 #185
     3x Wolf Alter JASMIN            Mar 23, 1838 #111
       + Gitel ALEKSANDER            1843
             married Jan 16, 1862 #7 Tarnow
        4o Cyli Cecilia JASMIN       Jan 18, 1863 Tarnow
          * Mayer BORGENICHT         Jul 9, 1848 Tarnow
                married Feb 22, 1885 #14 Vienna
           5x Oscar Israel BORGENICHT  Aug 2, 1892 #1732 Vienna
           5x Friedrich BORGENICHT   Dec 1, 1895 Vienna
        4o Adela JASMIN              1871 Bochnia
        4o Ernestyna JASMIN          1878
     3o Bluma JASMIN                 Sep 16, 1839 #448
     3o Reyzel JASMIN                1841 #168
     3x Moyzesz JASMIN               Sep 2, 1844 #428 - 1845 #229
